question: when do the walking dead comics come out
vanilla_rag_result: "The Walking Dead" comics were first issued in 2003 and ran until 2019. The series was published monthly, and specific events related to the comics, such as "The Walking Dead Day," were announced for October 13, 2018. Additionally, "The Walking Dead Weekly," which reprinted the first 52 issues, began on January 5, 2011, with one issue released each week for a year. The final issue, #193, was released in 2019.
